name: Star Wars
description:
Seventy-five issue series. A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away... Star Wars returns to Marvel Comics! Marvel lost the rights to Star Wars in 1986, which was then moved to the publisher Dark Horse. In 2015, the series returned to Marvel once more.

After seventy-five issues the series ended and restarted with new numbering, Star Wars Vol. 3.

Writers Kireon Gillen and Greg Pak went on to write other Star wars series, with Kireon Gillen writing all 25 issues Darth Vader Vol. 1, the first 19 issues of the spinoff series Doctor Aphra, and Greg Pak writing the ongoing Darth Vader Vol. 3.

Writers

  • Jason Aaron: #1-37 (total 37)
  • Kireon Gillen: #13, 14 & 38-67 (total 32)
  • Greg Pak: #68-75 (total 8)

Penciller

  • John Cassady: #1-6 (total 6)
  • Simone Bianchi: #7 (total 1)
  • Stuart Immonen: #8-12 (total 5)
  • Mike Deodotta Jr.: #13 & 14 (total 2)
  • Leinil Francis Yu: #16-19 (total 4)
  • Mike Mayhew: #15 & 20 (total 2)
  • Jorge Molina: #21-25 (total 5)
  • Salvador Larroca: #26-55 (total 30)
  • Andrea Broccardo: #56 & 61-62 (total 3)
  • Angel Unzueta: #57-60 & 63-67 (total 9)
  • Phil Noto: #68-75 (total 8)

Collected Editions

  • Star Wars: Skywalker Strikes (#1-6)
  • Star Wars Volume 1 (#1-12)
  • Star Wars by Jason Aaron Omnibus (#1-37)
  • Star Wars: Showdown On the Smuggler's Moon (#7-12)
  • Star Wars: From the Journals of Obi-Wan Kenobi (#7, 15, 20 & 26-30)
  • Star Wars: Han Solo (#8-12)
  • Star Wars: Vader Down (#13-14)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Volume 2 (#13-14)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader by Kieron Gillen & Salvador Larroca (#13-14)
  • Star Wars: Doctor Aphra Omnibus (#13, 19 & 31-32)
  • Star Wars: Rebel Jail (#15-19)
  • Star Wars Volume 2 (#15-25)
  • Star Wars: Last Flight of the Harbinger (#20-25)
  • Star Wars: Yoda's Secret War (#26-30)
  • Star Wars: Screaming Citadel (#31-32)
  • Star Wars: Doctor Aphra Volume 1 (#31-32)
  • Star Wars: Out Among The Stars (#33-37)
  • Star Wars Volume 3 (26-30, 33-37, Annual #2, #3)
  • Star Wars: The Ashes of Jedha (#38-43)
  • Star Wars by Gillen and Pak Omnibus (#38-75)
  • Star Wars: Mutiny At Mon Cala (#44-49)
  • Star Wars: Hope Dies (#50-55 & Annual #4)
  • Star Wars: The Escape (#56-61)
  • Star Wars: The Scourging of Shu-Torun (#62-67)
  • Star Wars: Rebels and Rogues (#68-72)
  • Star Wars: Rogues and Rebels (#73-75)

Non-U.S. Collected Editions

  • Star Wars Tomo - Volume 1 (#1-6) (Spanish)
  • Star Wars: Jason Aaron Omnibus - Omnibus 1 (#1-25) (Spanish)
  • Star Wars Tomo - Volume 2 (#7-12) (Spanish)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Omnibus (#13-14) (Spanish)
  • Star Wars: Vader Derribado (#13-14) (Spanish)
  • Star Wars Tomo - Volume 7 (#38-43) (Spanish)

Translated into Spanish.

name: Darth Vader
description:
The infamous Sith-Lord Darth Vader stars in his own ongoing series, brought to you by Marvel Comics! The series lasted 25 issues and had one Darth Vader Annual. The series was then replaced with the Star Wars Doctor Aphra series. It also continued in Darth Vader Vol. 2 written by Charles Soule.

Collected Editions

  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Volume 1: Vader (#1-6)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Volume 1 (#1-12)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader by Kieron Gillen & Salvador Larroca (#1-25)
  • Star Wars: Doctor Aphra Omnibus (#3-4, 8 & 21)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Volume 2: Shadows and Secrets (#7-12)
  • Star Wars: Vader Down (#13-15)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Volume 2 (#13-25)
  • Star Wars by Jason Aaron Omnibus (#13-15)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Volume 3: The Shu-Torun War (#16-19)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Volume 4: End of Games (#20-25)

Non-U.S. Collected Editions

  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Tomo - Volume 1 (#1-5) (Spanish)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Omnibus (#1-25) (Spanish)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Tomo - Volume 2 (#6-12) (Spanish)
  • Star Wars: Vader Derribado (#13-15) (Spanish)
  • Star Wars: Jason Aaron Omnibus - Omnibus 1 (#13-15) (Spanish)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Tomo - La guerra Shu-Torun (#16-19) (Spanish)
  • Star Wars: Darth Vader Tomo - El Final de Todos Los Juegos (#20-25) (Spanish)

Translated into Spanish.

name: Kanan
description:
Ongoing series.

Collected Editions

  • Star Wars: Kanan: The Last Padawan (#1-6)
  • Star Wars: Kanan: First Blood (#7-12)

Note: As per the indicia the first six issues of this series was titled "Kanan - The Last Padawan" but starting with #7 it was shortened to just "Kanan".

Non-U.S. Collected Editions

  • Star Wars Kanan: El último Padawan - Volume 1 (#1-6) (Spanish)
  • Star Wars Kanan: El último Padawan - Volume 2 (#7-12) (Spanish)

name: Star Wars: Poe Dameron
description:
Thirty-one issue series featuring Resistance's Ace Pilot.

  • Star Wars: Poe Dameron: Black Squadron (#1-6)
  • Star Wars: Poe Dameron: The Gathering Storm (#8-13)
  • Star Wars: Poe Dameron: Legend Lost (#7 & 14-19)
  • Star Wars: Poe Dameron: Legend Found (#20-25)
  • Star Wars: Poe Dameron: The Spark and the Fire (#26-31)

Note: Volume named per the indicia, early issues only used "Poe Dameron" but later on it was changed to include "Star Wars:".

Translated into Spanish.
